column1: Hildifons Took was a Hobbits of the Shire.

Hildifons was the sixth of the twelve children of Gerontius Took. He went on a journey outside the Shire and never returned.  When Bilbo Baggins was young he used to pester Gandalf for information about Hobbits who had "gone off"
The name contains hild "battle" and fons "ready".
